feedback_1.mainSubject: Sensor tracking reliability and dongle functionality
painPoints: Sensor stops tracking momentarily even at high polling rate (8000Hz)
Issue persists whether wired or wireless
Initial dongle was faulty requiring return
High price with significant reliability problems
improvementSuggestions: Ensure dongle reliability and quality control

positives: Product has no flaws in quality or performance
painPoints: Not worth the high price given cheaper products with half the specs
improvementSuggestions: Consider adjusting price or enhancing unique value proposition
